Body: Ah, you've finally found me. Come to browse my wares? My commissions are full, but for the right price, I'm sure we can work something out. Or... that look you're giving me... Are you perhaps a fan?

Title: Glassweaver
Body: I- Wh- What? What do you mean, you just 'wandered in here'? Nobody comes to see the Legendary Weaver of Glass without a reason, especially outside of my forge! It must have been... FATE!

Title: Glassweaver
Body: Yes, yes, you see, I've actually been having some trouble lately. I know, it's hard to believe, me, in trouble, right, but I do need the assistance of a daring one such as you. Think of it as... a quest, or something. Adventurers love those, right?

Title: Glassweaver
Body: I am an artist, and crystal is my medium, but to properly work it I need some very powerful equipment, and, well, how should I say this... I did maybe forget to maintain the tools in my chosen forge for a bit. Only a few centuries. Don't give me that look.

Title: Glassweaver
Body: You might not be able to tell with your lack of experience and all, but I give it only a few more years before the magma channels erode and the forgeheart collapses. So... I've been diligently scouting out a nearby Forge Temple. Thing is, it's almost in even more disrepair!

Title: Glassweaver
Body: If you, handsome, wise, kind explorer, are brave enough to venture in and fix up the forge, I'll let you keep whatever you find inside.

Title: Glassweaver
Body: No- Wait! You can't just barge in, you need a [c/FFFFAA:Key]. I need to know if I am giving my faith and crystal to the right person! So, when you think you're strong enough, challenge me properly and I'll put you through my [c/FF9999:Glassweaver Gauntlet] to really test your mettle! Don't keep me waiting!

Title: Glassweaver
Body: Are you finally ready to face my [c/FF9999:Glassweaver Gauntlet]? It's honestly very hard for me to tell, you lot are always so small and scrawny.

Title: Glassweaver
Body: Adventurer, you return! Are you here to challenge my [c/FF9999:Glassweaver Gauntlet], or just gaze at my wonderful works?

Title: Glassweaver
Body: Ah, my fated champion! Here to prove yourself worthy in my [c/FF9999:Glassweaver Gauntlet]?

Title: Glassweaver
Body: Congratulations, you destroyed many decades of my finest work! I really should have thought this through more. I was going to have those help you clear out the forge, but... I'm sure you'll figure it out. Let me fill you in on what to expect.

Title: Glassweaver
Body: There are two main rooms of the forge at the heart of the temple. The [c/AAAAFF:engine room] where the [c/88FFFF:gears] are out of allaignment, and the [c/AAAAFF:main forge] where the [c/FFAA88:light] that heats the forge has become obstructed. If you want access to the vault at the bottom, you'll have to get them in working order.

Title: Glassweaver
Body: There was [c/AAF0FF:something] in that vault a [c/DDBBFF:feathered fellow] was quite interested in... Now I'm not sure what it is, but it couldn't possibly be more important than my work.

Title: Glassweaver
Body: Anyways, there should also probably be some [c/77FFCC:spare glass] down there that even an ameteur such as yourself could shape at something like an [c/DDDDDD:anvil]. With a small offering you'll be able to draw out the [c/FF9999:Sentinel] to destroy it, and reclaim my forge!

Title: Glassweaver
Body: Why are you looking at me like that? Did I not tell you about the [c/FF9999:Sentinel] before? Ah. It's just a... slightly oversized ceramic snake. That's all. It is not in possession of [c/AAF0FF:starlight reinforced crystals] or capable of melting you with its breath... Just... Come talk to me when its gone.

Title: Glassweaver
Body: Anyway, here's the [c/FFFFAA:Key]. Why do you suddenly look so uneasy? Go and get me my forge temple!

Title: Glassweaver
Body: It doesn't look like you've cleared out that [c/FF9999:Sentinel]. What are you standing there for? I'm busy standing here!

Title: Glassweaver
Body: Don't you have better things to be doing, like ridding my forge of that [c/FF9999:Sentinel]?

Title: Glassweaver
Body: Adventurer! You defeated the [c/FF9999:Sentinel] so soon? It's a miracle! Oh. Oh, you didn't. Never mind. Go away.

Title: Glassweaver
Body: Well, based on the horrifying screech that shattered half of my work, I'm going to assume you managed to 'deal' with the [c/FF9999:Sentinel]. I'll be moving in soon.

Title: Glassweaver
Body: Come see me in the temple in a day or so. I'll be able to make you [c/AAF0FF:something special] as thanks for your house cleaning duties.

Title: Glassweaver
Body: Hello again! I humbly welcome you to my new abode, as you can see I have already began working my genius on this place, simply look at the beautiful glass pylon to your right!

Title: Glassweaver
Body: Ah, yes, truly wonderful... Anyways, I did promise you a reward. Our mutual [c/DDBBFF:feathered fellow] swung by earlier and dropped off a design for something he said you would be interested in. I've taken the liberty of making it for you.

Title: Glassweaver
Body: If you have the materials I do have some ideas for a few... variations on this. If you find yourself interested I can offer you the services of my forge.
